 Du kommer arbeta i nära samarbete med bland annat affärskonsulter, applikationsexperter, utvecklare och andra arkitekter. I uppdragen kommer du att vara en nyckelperson som bidrar till att aktivt driva och ta fram efterfrågat material så som lösningsförslag och icke-funktionella krav för att kunna ta viktiga beslut inom både arkitektur och teknik. Vi arbetar brett inom olika branscher och kunder, vilket också ger möjlighet för dig att utveckla dig själv och din kompetens.
   

  

 Som arkitekt blir du erbjuden ett mentorskap från andra seniora arkitekter som vägleder och stöttar dig i din framtida utveckling. Du ges dessutom möjligheter till den kompetensutveckling du eftersträvar, inte bara i kundleveranser utan också genom kurser och certifieringar. Du kommer in i en lyckad kombination av det stora företagets stabilitet och resurser, och det mindre teamets sammansvetsade energi och gruppanda.
   

  

 Du blir en del av ett härligt team konsulter med olika erfarenhetsnivå som alla delar ett brinnande intresse för arkitektur och lösningar. Vi gillar att samverka i en kreativ, positiv och energigivande miljö där samarbete, kontinuerligt lärande och att stötta varandra värderas högt i det dagliga arbetet.
   

  

 Kvalifikationer för att bli framgångsrik denna roll
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har:
   

  

* 5 års erfarenhet som IT-arkitekt
* En djup teknisk kunskap och ett intresse for kommande tekniker
* Relevant högskoleutbildning inom IT


 Det är meriterande om du har kännedom kring:
   

  

* Agila metoder
* Maskininlärning och AI
* Molnplattformar


 Det är även meriterande om du har någon certifiering från IASA eller liknande.
   

  

**Låt oss som ägare omvandla verklig insikt till handling – tillsammans.**
 Livet på CGI bygger på ägande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhörighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna nå din fulla potential.
   

  

 Du är inbjuden att ta ägandeskap redan från första dagen i vårt arbete med att förverkliga vår dröm om att skapa en arbetsmiljö där vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgången för vårt företag. Det är därför vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare än anställda. Vi drar nytta av vår kollektiva framgång och tillsammans får vi möjlighet att aktivt forma vår företagsstrategi och inriktning.
   

  

 Ditt arbete skapar värde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lösningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du får tillgång till globala möjligheter att skala upp dina idéer, omfamna nya möjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.
   

  

 Du kommer att forma din karriär tillsammans med ett företag som är byggt för att växa och bestå. Du får stöd av ledare som bryr sig om din hälsa och ditt välbefinnande och ger dig möjligheter att fördjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
   

  

 Bli en del en av världens största leverantörer av IT- och affärskonsulttjänster.

title: IT-Arkitekt & specialist inom säkerhet
description:
Beskrivning av tjänsten
   

  

 Är du IT-Arkitekt & specialist inom säkerhet? Trivs du när du får jobba i en social roll med många kontaktytor? Har du arbetat som konsult eller i en linjebefattning och är ute efter nästa steg i din karriär?
   

  

**Då är det dig vi söker!**
 Drivs du likt oss av att ligga i digitaliseringens framkant? Vill du dessutom använda denna drivkraft i en konsultroll och hjälpa våra kunder att bättre ta tillvara på digitaliseringens möjligheter?
   

  

 I rollen har du kunden i fokus och driver dem framåt i uppdrag som förstudier, utredningar, strategiformuleringar och implementationsprojekt. Du agerar i många olika roller som t.ex. verksamhetsanalytiker, arkitekt och projektledare, alltid med ett rådgivande förhållningssätt.
   

  

 CGI är en global IT leverantör som levererar högkvalitativ affärsrådgivning, systemintegration och outsourcing tjänster. Vi arbetar sida vid sida med kunder för att omvandla innovation, data och teknik till framgång för dem.
   

  

 Du kommer att vara en del av CGI Public där vi jobbar tätt tillsammans för många olika kunder i en föränderlig miljö. Vi söker dig som vill vara med och göra skillnad för våra kunder, där du får jobba med spännande uppdrag och vara med och på en strategisk och operativ nivå.
   

  

 Tillsammans med ett gäng fantastiska medarbetare och ledare kan vi erbjuda dig ett roligt och stimulerande arbete. Vi har en generös företagskultur och delar med oss av vår kunskap, vilket också är en förutsättning för att vi tillsammans ska lyckas med att utveckla vår verksamhet.
   

  

 Dina framtida arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 Som IT-Arkitekt & specialist inom säkerhet hos oss kommer du att vara en nyckelperson som bidrar till att driva och ta fram efterfrågat material för att därefter kunna ta viktiga beslut inom både arkitektur och teknik samt lösningsförslag till våra kunder.
   

  

 Rollen kan innefatta att ansvara för säkerhetsutredningar och göra analyser samt agera på ”onormala” händelser genom att göra säkerhetsbedömningar. Du kommer även att arbeta med säkerhetsincidenter genom att skapa rekomendationer till ökad säkerhet i kundernas IT-miljöer. Även att leda workshops samt möta kunder för att ta fram olika förslag på lösning och tidsestimat utifrån kunders behov kommer ingå.
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen som söker vi dig som är problemlösare, ansvarstagande, flexibel och relationsskapande med ett brinnande intresse för IT-säkerhet och nätverk. Du trivs med att jobba både i grupp och självständigt.
   

  

 Du kan flytande svenska, både i tal och skrift, då våra kunder primärt finns inom den publika sektorn samt behärskar engelska som är CGIs koncernspråk samt har en akademisk examen som högskoleingenjör eller motsvarande civil-/master examen inom exempelvis IT-säkerhet, data IT eller nätverk, alternativt relevant erfarenhet från liknande roll.
   

  

**På grund av tjänstens karaktär kräver att du har svenskt medborgarskap då du arbetar med säkerhetsklassificerad information och samhällskritiska system.**
 Kvalifikationer för att bli framgångsrik denna roll
   

  

* Vara väl insatt i tekniska standarder, tekniker och produkter.
* Goda kunskaper inom design av IT-infrastruktur, nätverk, applikationsdrift och Operativsystem (UNIX, Linux samt Windows) samt överföringsprotokoll som tex TCP/IP.
* Erfarenhet av Identitetshantering samt sårbarhetshantering.
* Stark social och kommunikationsförmåga med fokus på att skapa goda relationer
* Stark analytisk förmåga för att enkelt sätta sig in i och förstå komplexa miljöer och kontexter samt hur komponenter är relaterade till varandra
* Uttrycker sig tydligt i skrift och tal både på Svenska och Engelska; förmåga att skriva tydliga och koncisa säkerhetsdokument
* Meriterande om du har erfarenhet av systemutveckling och/eller projektledning


**Låt oss som ägare omvandla verklig insikt till handling – tillsammans.**
 Livet på CGI bygger på ägande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhörighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna nå din fulla potential.
   

  

 Du är inbjuden att ta ägandeskap redan från första dagen i vårt arbete med att förverkliga vår dröm om att skapa en arbetsmiljö där vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgången för vårt företag. Det är därför vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare än anställda. Vi drar nytta av vår kollektiva framgång och tillsammans får vi möjlighet att aktivt forma vår företagsstrategi och inriktning.
   

  

 Ditt arbete skapar värde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lösningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du får tillgång till globala möjligheter att skala upp dina idéer, omfamna nya möjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.
   

  

 Du kommer att forma din karriär tillsammans med ett företag som är byggt för att växa och bestå. Du får stöd av ledare som bryr sig om din hälsa och ditt välbefinnande och ger dig möjligheter att fördjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
   

  

 Bli en del en av världens största leverantörer av IT- och affärskonsulttjänster.

title: ICT Lead Auditor
description:
**About Us**
 We are the independent expert in assurance and risk management. Driven by our purpose, to safeguard life, property, and the environment, we empower our customers and their stakeholders with facts and reliable insights so that critical decisions can be made with confidence.
   

  

 As a trusted voice for many of the world’s most successful organizations, we use our knowledge to advance safety and performance, set industry benchmarks, and inspire and invent solutions to tackle global transformations.
   

  

**About Business Assurance**
 We help companies ensure compliance, build high-performing management systems, and meet competence needs within a wide range of industries. DNV helps companies understand Working with us, you can be involved in technically challenging and innovative projects worldwide demanding a broad variety of expertise. Our strong focus on research and innovation opens an array of opportunities, and allows you to engage in projects which develop next generation solutions. and manage their risk picture through our management system certification and training portfolios.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a result of further growth of our Business Assurance Unit in Sweden we are looking for qualified
 **Lead Auditors** 
 within the
 **Information Security ISO 27001** 
 area, preferably combined with ISO 9001.
   

  

 As a
 **Lead Auditor** 
 you will be part of our team of auditors. Your assignments will be performing audits according to standards for information security – normally at the customer’s premises - in a wide variety of industries.
   

  

 You will be part of a professional team of colleagues with experience in many industries. As a Lead Auditor you will work both independently and in multidisciplinary teams.
   

  

**The Assignment May Include**
* Performing audits for Swedish and international clients
* Project management of larger certification projects
* Development of new services, training services, etc. on an ad hoc basis
* Supporting sales team and contributing to sales revenue.


 What we offer
   

  

 In DNV we are proud to lead the development in our main industries. Whether we work with some of the world’s leading companies to help solve some of their risk or safety challenges or we initiate joint industry projects to solve an industry-wide technical issue, we always aim to deliver expert insight and value to our customers and stakeholders. You will work with experts from a wide range of disciplines and build your competence, problem-solving abilities. It will broaden your view.
   

  

**We offer**
* A strong company culture with an emphasis on competence development
* Great colleagues who value teamwork and support
* Attractive total compensation package
* International working environment
* Flexible working hours and focus on work/life balance
* Interesting and challenging customers and projects, both national and international
* Be part of a world-leading company that has a global reach with more than 12 000 employees around to world and is headquartered in Norway.
* The possibility to grow and develop your competencies and ambitions within DNV.


**Requirements**
 About you
   

  

* Relevant educational background
* At least four years full-time practical work experience in information technology, of which at least two years in a role or function relating to information security
* Experience with one or more of the following standards: ISO 27001 and ISO 9001 and knowledge of best practices regarding information security.
* ISO 22301 - Business continuity and ISO 20000 - Service Management is not a requirement but is an advantage.
* Good communication and collaborative skills
* Must be able to travel, including overnight stays, often involving travel outside of normal working hours
* Good English skills in speech and writing, as well as fluent in Swedish, both in speech and writing
* Great commercial and sales skills preferred
* Strong communication and training skills preferred.


**Personal qualities**
* Are organized, service-minded, and focused on timely delivery with the right quality
* Are both a team player as well as self-reliant
* Like working in an international organization
* Are business- and customer-oriented
* Good communication and commercial skills, able to choose appropriate methods and style to suit the situation and audience.


 For more details about this role please contact: Patrik Flink, Operations Manager, Sweden at +46 708 301 683
   

  

 Please submit your CV in English or Swedish.
   

  

 Interviews will be held on an ongoing basis.
   

  

 Please be informed you may be requested to provide DNV with additional documents for a background check.

title: Experienced Data Analytics Consultants to Deloitte
description:
Deloitte is a leading global provider of Audit & Assurance, Tax & Legal, and Consultative Services. With more than 457,000 professionals in over 150 countries, we help our clients and society to solve complex problems and achieve ambitious goals. We are driven by one purpose: to make an impact that matters. To us, this means lasting results for our clients and their businesses, ideas and actions that contribute to a greater good. It also means empowering our people and supporting them in their growth journey.
   

  




**Job Description**

 Deloitte's business area Technology & Transformation Nordic is a market leader and works together with decision-makers in both global and local organizations. We support organizations in their challenges regarding strategy issues and in the implementation of complex transformations that often include major business-driven IT changes.
   

  





 At Deloitte, we truly believe in the acceleration of the value of data. Our AI & Data team is now looking for additional data analytics consultant. You’ll be part of a team at the forefront of analytics that works with capturing data’s value and helping clients to understand the way into the future.
   

  





 In your role, you will often be the bridge between the technical part of the organization and management, making both parts understand each other better to enhance progression and improvement, while avoiding unnecessary and costly mistakes. You can expect to be working with hands-on implementation tasks as well as being in advisory roles in relation to data and analytics assignments.
   

  





 Key Responsibilities
   

  




* Work closely with clients to understand their business objectives and identify opportunities where data analytics can provide insights.
* Advise how to develop and implement data analytics solutions based on our frameworks and best practices within advanced analytics.
* Create data visualizations and dashboards to communicate findings and support data-driven decision-making.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data engineers, data scientists, and business analysts, to deliver comprehensive solutions.
* Stay current with the latest trends and technologies in data analytics and apply them to client engagements.


**Qualifications**

 The requirement for this role is:
   

  




* Master's degree in data science, Industrial Engineering, Computer Science, or other similar and relevant educational background.
* Work experience in data analytics, data science, or other related roles.
* Proficiency in data analytics tools and languages such as SQL, Dax and python.
* You live and work in Sweden, preferably in Stockholm
* Fluent in Swedish and English


 It is beneficial if you have experiences with any of the following:
   

  

* Experiences with Databricks, Snowflake and/or any hyperscaler (GCP, Azure or AWS) is a plus.
* Excellent communication skills with the ability to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.


**Additional Information**

**We offer**




 We can offer you access to our global AI & Data network of experts, a stimulating and supportive environment and a fantastic opportunity to help you take the next step in your professional career. You will also be part of a steep Nordic growth journey which in the future will open up for many new career opportunities within our Nordic firm.
   

  

**The way of working at Deloitte – our commitment to you**




 At Deloitte we
 **foster a collaborative culture** 
 where talented individuals can produce their best work. We value innovative thinking, diverse insights, and a genuinely distinctive level of customer service. We value difference with respect at the heart of our inclusive culture.
   

  

 Our role is to
 **unlock potential for growth and innovation** 
 . We believe this requires real collaboration – with our own networks and with our clients. It’s why we commit to truly getting under the skin of our client’s needs, developing a full appreciation for their environment, goals, and ambitions.
   

  

 We
 **work together with our clients** 
 to help find the right solution and to help to apply that solution. Our aim is to leave behind ambassadors who are equipped to continue the transformation we have started.
   

  





**How to apply**




 You apply online. We encourage you to apply as soon as possible, as we are screening applications continuously and interviewing on a rolling basis. Please submit your CV, cover letter and university grades as part of your application.
   

  

 As a qualitative part of Deloitte's recruitment process, our final candidates undergo a background check, to increase awareness of our future employees, secure the working environment for our employees and meet regulatory requirements. The background check process is carried out in collaboration with ToFindOut. https://tofindout.se/en/background-check/
   

  

**Questions?**




 If you have any questions regarding the role, please contact Patric Barenthin pbarenthin@deloitte.se. For questions regarding the role or application process, please contact Johannes Forgaard, Talent Acquisition Specialist, at jeikforgaard@deloitte.se
 
 .
   

  






**We are looking forward to your application!**




**What impact will you make?**




 Every day, your work will make an impact that matters, while you thrive in a dynamic culture of inclusion, collaboration and high performance. We do not just aspire to make solutions. We wish to create an impact that makes a positive and crucial difference for the people around us, our clients and our society. Deloitte is where you’ll find unlimited opportunities to succeed and realize your full potential.

title: VP Sales Nordics
description:
At Exotec, we are at the forefront of technological excellence in order to redefine the relationship between humans and robots. Our solutions are contributing to the success of some of the largest brands in retail and e-Commerce by revolutionizing the way they fulfill their orders to the end consumers, all while mitigating labor constraints and increasing workplace safety.
   

  

 Through the unification of artificial intelligence and high-performance hardware, our robotic solutions are now deployed across the globe and our exponential growth has led us to become the first industrial unicorn in France.
   

  

 Working at Exotec is an exciting opportunity to give purpose to your skills. Learn and grow with over 1000 ExoPeople around the world to help turn your ideas into a reality.
   

  

**The robotics revolution is just the beginning at Exotec. Will you be part of it?**
**Responsibilities**
* Establish and develop strong partnerships with recognized logistic solution integrators
* Act as the ambassador of Exotec and promote our products to our partners
* Closely support the integrators during the presale phase
* Evaluate and prioritize business opportunities to maximize the visibility of our products and support market penetration
* Participate in logistic events to develop and strengthen your network and introduce our company to key stakeholders
* Track progress of development and create opportunities to ensure goals achievement


**Requirements**
* 10+ years of experience and a proven track record in sales and business development in our industry
* At least 5 years of working experience in Nordic countries
* Bachelor's or master's degree in Business Administration or Logistics
* Native level in German and fluency in English
* Strong working knowledge of the company's products, competitive products and the market


 Exotec is an equal opportunity employer and all applicants will be considered without regard to race, religion, color, sex, gender, sexual orientation, pregnancy, age, national origin, ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, military or veteran status, genetic information, marital status, ethnicity, or any other protected classification, in accordance with applicable federal, state, and local laws. We provide an inclusive work environment that respects all differences.

title: Connect Businesses with Elite AI & Data Talent!
description:
**If you love the thrill of sales, are comfortable picking up the phone, and are excited to sell the world’s most brilliant talent, this role is perfect for you!** 




  





 Are you a natural at building relationships and closing deals? Do you thrive on the excitement of helping companies solve their most pressing challenges? We’re looking for motivated sales professionals to join our team and sell access to our top-tier network of AI and Data contractors—experts who are shaping the future of technology.
 



  





**What You’ll Do:** 




  




* Identify and connect with companies in need of AI & Data talent across industries
* Build relationships with decision-makers and establish partnerships
* Sell the expertise of world-class contractors who are driving innovation and transforming businesses
* Play a pivotal role in helping companies solve complex problems by providing them with cutting-edge talent



  





**What’s in it for You:** 




  




* **Uncapped commission:** 
 Your earning potential grows with every deal youclose
* **Flexible role:** 
 Manage your own sales pipeline and work independently
* **Exciting industry:** 
 You'll be working with businesses at the forefront of AI, data, and innovation
* **Access to game-changing talent:** 
 Be part of the solution by connecting companies with brilliant minds who are pushing boundaries in AI and Data



  





**Apply now and start selling the future!**

title: Cloud Solution Architect: Multi-Cloud Security (Defender for Cloud, Sentinel, CSPM, CNAPP, etc.)
description:
With over 17,000 employees worldwide, the mission of the Customer Experience & Success (CE&S) organization is to empower customers to accelerate business value through differentiated customer experiences that leverage Microsoft’s products and services, ignited by our people and culture. Come join CE&S and help us build a future where customers achieve their business outcomes faster with technology that does more.
   

  

 We are looking for a Cloud Solution Architect (CSA), specializing in Security who is passionate about driving our customers’ security transformation on the Microsoft Azure and Microsoft 365 Platforms. This is a customer-facing role, owning the technical relationship between the customer and Microsoft, helping customers to leverage their Microsoft investments through architecture, implementation, and operational health engagements.
   

  

 Microsoft’s mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As employees we come together with a growth mindset, innovate to empower others, and collaborate to realize our shared goals. Each day we build on our values of respect, integrity, and accountability to create a culture of inclusion where everyone can thrive at work and beyond.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* You will drive positive Customer Satisfaction and become a trusted advisor and provide feedback and insights from customers/partners and be the Voice of Customer to share insights and best practices, connect with Global Security teams at Microsoft, Engineering and Product teams to remove blockers and influence the solution roadmap.
* You will land an end-to-end value prop for Security (i.e., Zero Trust) which spans the breadth of Microsoft Security offerings, and with focus on Threat Protection, ID + Access Management and Cloud Security.
* You will support customers through the adoption lifecycle, through planning, adoption, deployment and optimization as you support increasing drive of Microsoft security products utilization as you lead technical solutioning and nurturing across the customer journey.
* You will deliver technical presentations and demos and propose high-level solutions and work with key Microsoft and Partner resources to drive deployment and customer adoption Identify cross sell/upsell/Unified opportunities through customer engagement.
* You will align your individual skilling to team/area demands and Customer Success goals and accelerate customer outcomes - Share expertise, contribute to IP creation and re-use to accelerate customer outcomes.
* Run Architectural Design Session to build a plan for implementing the solution – governing design in line with customer business goals and their technical environment. Outcome is consensus on solution design and next steps toward production.
* Collaborate and orchestrate with other Cloud Solution Architects and Microsoft stakeholders including FastTrack, partner, and Microsoft Consulting in developing complex end-to-end Enterprise solutions with the Microsoft Security platform.


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, Business, or related field AND significant experience in cloud/infrastructure technologies, information technology (IT) consulting/support, systems administration, network operations, software development/support, technology solutions, practice development, architecture, and/or consulting
+ OR Master's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, Business, or related field AND significant experience in cloud/infrastructure technologies, technology solutions, practice development, architecture, and/or consulting
+ OR equivalent experience

* Relevant experience working in a customer-facing role (e.g., internal and/or external)
* Relevant experience working on technical projects
* Technical Certification in Cloud (e.g., Azure, Amazon Web Services, Google, security certifications)
+ Threat protection, SIEM and Incident Response; Extended Detection and Response (XDR); Security Orchestration, Automation, and Response (SOAR); Security Operation Center Management; Identity and Access Management; Cloud Infrastructure; Cloud Security; Data Security; Certification in one or more of the following technologies preferred: Microsoft 365 Security Administrator, Microsoft Security Operations, Cloud Security, CCSP, CEH, OSCP, GSEC.


 Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations.

 We are looking for a Cloud Solution Architect (CSA), specializing in Security who is passionate about driving our customers’ security transformation on the Microsoft Azure and Microsoft 365 Platforms. This is a customer-facing role, owning the technical relationship between the customer and Microsoft, helping customers to leverage their Microsoft investments through architecture, implementation, and operational health engagements.
   

  

 Microsoft’s mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As employees we come together with a growth mindset, innovate to empower others, and collaborate to realize our shared goals. Each day we build on our values of respect, integrity, and accountability to create a culture of inclusion where everyone can thrive at work and beyond.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* You will drive positive Customer Satisfaction and become a trusted advisor and provide feedback and insights from customers/partners and be the Voice of Customer to share insights and best practices, connect with Global Security teams at Microsoft, Engineering and Product teams to remove blockers and influence the solution roadmap.
* You will land an end-to-end value prop for Security (i.e., Zero Trust) which spans the breadth of Microsoft Security offerings, and with focus on Threat Protection, ID + Access Management and Cloud Security.
* You will support customers through the adoption lifecycle, through planning, adoption, deployment and optimization as you support increasing drive of Microsoft security products utilization as you lead technical solutioning and nurturing across the customer journey.
* You will deliver technical presentations and demos and propose high-level solutions and work with key Microsoft and Partner resources to drive deployment and customer adoption Identify cross sell/upsell/Unified opportunities through customer engagement.
* You will align your individual skilling to team/area demands and Customer Success goals and accelerate customer outcomes - Share expertise, contribute to IP creation and re-use to accelerate customer outcomes.
* Run Architectural Design Session to build a plan for implementing the solution – governing design in line with customer business goals and their technical environment. Outcome is consensus on solution design and next steps toward production.
* Collaborate and orchestrate with other Cloud Solution Architects and Microsoft stakeholders including FastTrack, partner, and Microsoft Consulting in developing complex end-to-end Enterprise solutions with the Microsoft Security platform.


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, Business, or related field AND significant experience in cloud/infrastructure technologies, information technology (IT) consulting/support, systems administration, network operations, software development/support, technology solutions, practice development, architecture, and/or consulting
+ OR Master's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, Business, or related field AND significant experience in cloud/infrastructure technologies, technology solutions, practice development, architecture, and/or consulting
+ OR equivalent experience

* Relevant experience working in a customer-facing role (e.g., internal and/or external)
* Relevant experience working on technical projects
* Technical Certification in Cloud (e.g., Azure, Amazon Web Services, Google, security certifications)
+ Threat protection, SIEM and Incident Response; Extended Detection and Response (XDR); Security Orchestration, Automation, and Response (SOAR); Security Operation Center Management; Identity and Access Management; Cloud Infrastructure; Cloud Security; Data Security; Certification in one or more of the following technologies preferred: Microsoft 365 Security Administrator, Microsoft Security Operations, Cloud Security, CCSP, CEH, OSCP, GSEC.


 Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations.

title: Government Affairs Advisor– Defence Policy
description:
*Saab is a place where teamwork makes things fly. Literally. Join us and experience our supportive and friendly workplace.*
 Your role
   

  

 Your primary role is to develop, lead, and implement Saab’s defence policy priorities and advocacy objectives. This involves following and identifying defence policy initiatives that may impact Saab’s business conditions and taking appropriate action to these changes. You will also provide insights and analysis to offer strategic guidance to senior leaders, relevant parts of Saab’s organisation, and other stakeholders.
   

  

 The role requires you to independently initiate and develop your work while coordinating closely with the government affairs team. You must collaborate effectively with other parts of Saab to ensure alignment between core business priorities and public policy goals. Working against deadlines and on short notice is essential.
   

  

 Additionally, as a key figure in collaborating with both external and internal actors, you are expected to identify and develop areas for improvement in Saab’s work. Analytical and cooperative skills are of essence to succeed in the role, as you have to work with both internal and external stakeholders to understand how to create mutual benefits.
   

  

 Sweden is Saab´s largest market and the location for the majority of Saab´s employees. Saab´s business conditions and opportunities are affected by the decisions made by Sweden as a customer, regulator and as a supporter in business opportunities in different markets. Swedish Government Affairs (part of Group function Government Affairs) is tasked to follow and analyse the Swedish decision-making system, and to elaborate the company´s public policy and positions in current issues.
   

  

 Swedish Government Affairs main tasks are to:
   

  

* Follow and analyse the development in security and defence policies, with a focus on Sweden and its relations with other countries and regional organizations.
* Assess and communicate on public initiatives, e.g., new proposals and regulations, and to develop Saab’s position in order to capture opportunities or mitigate risks.
* Provide strategic guidance on political affairs to the executive management and to all parts of the Saab Group.
* Develop, lead and implement government affairs activities such as advocacy efforts, outreach programs and key initiatives supporting Saab’s strategic and business goals.
* Coordinate and facilitate market and export support engagement.
* Engage with key stakeholders, including political representatives, senior government officials, regulators, industry association and alliance partners to promote and advocate the company’s public policies.


 Group Government Affairs is headed by Senior Vice President Jonas Hjelm and consists of two departments; Swedish Government Affairs and the NATO and EU Office. The current job opportunity is placed at Swedish Government Affairs and reports to the Head of Swedish Government Affairs, Per de la Gardie.
   

  

 Your profile
   

  

 This position comes with high demands, requiring at least 8 years of relevant experience and a solid academic background, preferably holding a master’s or bachelor’s degree in a related field. You should demonstrate high competence in both spoken and written Swedish and English. Candidates should have proven analytical expertise in security and defense policy, whether within Sweden, the EU, or globally, and experience in developing public policy is a significant advantage.
   

  

 The role requires a strong drive for high-quality output and the ability to take initiative throughout the analytical process. Experience from defence and security is necessary as well as working in politically driven organizations, coupled with a well-established personal network within this sector, is essential. It is highly desirable if you have held roles within the Government Office, an agency, political engagement, or think-tanks, and have an established network in these areas.
   

  

 Additionally, the position requires extensive cooperation both within Saab and with external stakeholders, so being cooperative and adept at collaboration is crucial.
   

  

*This position requires that you pass a security vetting based on the current regulations* 
*around/of security protection. For positions requiring security clearance additional obligations on citizenship may apply.*
 What you will be part of
   

  

 Behind our innovations stand the people who make them possible. Brave pioneers and curious minds. Everyday heroes and inventive troubleshooters. Those who share deep knowledge and those who explore sky-high. And everyone in between.
   

  

 Joining us means making an impact together, contributing in our own unique ways. From crafting complex code and building impressive defence and security solutions to simply sharing a coffee with a colleague, every action counts. We encourage you to take on challenges, to create smart inventions and grow in our friendly and tech-savvy workspace. We have a solid mission to keep people and society safe.
   

  

 Saab is a leading defence and security company with an enduring mission, to help nations keep their people and society safe. Empowered by its 22,000 talented people, Saab constantly pushes the boundaries of technology to create a safer and more sustainable world.
   

  

 Saab designs, manufactures and maintains advanced systems in aeronautics, weapons, command and control, sensors and underwater systems. Saab is headquartered in Sweden. It has major operations all over the world and is part of the domestic defence capability of several nations. Read more about us here
   

  

 Kindly observe that this is an ongoing recruitment process and that the position might be filled before the closing date of the advertisement.

title: Solution Architect, Solna / Hybrid
description:
Do you want to be part of a dynamic and rapidly changing environment at one of the Nordic region's largest companies? If you have a strong background within the area of Service Management and Agile development, this is the place to be.
   

  

**Join Us**
 The team responsible for the Atlassian tool suite in PostNord is expanding. Facing more than 30.000 users in the Nordic Countries including subsidiaries and thousands of agents within IT and Business units. Supporting the organization with an efficient and reliable platform including large automation capabilities and an expanding scope. Connect the worlds of Service Management and Agile development. Join the team to be a part of this exciting journey. Our work environment is flexible, offering a hybrid working model with 50 percent remote work.
   

  

**Job Duties**
 In the role of Solution Architect, you will be responsible for the following:
   

  

* Define and align the architectural framework in collaboration with stakeholders, ensuring it aligns with business goals. Ensuring compliance with industry standards and best practices.
* Align teams to a shared technical direction and partner with them in elaborating the solution, validating technology assumptions, and evaluating implementation alternatives.
* Ideate and create enablers to evolve the technical landscape, fostering adaptive design and engineering practices.
* Collaborate closely with Enterprise and System Architects to address architectural concerns at respective levels.
* Collaborate with team, Product Owner, Tech Lead to anchor the architectural framework. Establish governance structure with architectural principles and standards to be followed within the tool’s ecosystem.
* Ensure systems compliance with legal and regulatory requirements, safeguarding data privacy and security.


**You will work with:**
* An Agile team with technical and business-oriented roles overseeing the Atlassian tool suite.
* SAFe practices, taking part in relevant ceremonies with the team and in the ART.
* A network of architects and related roles.
* Collaborating with stakeholders from business as well as IT in understanding their requirements.
* Collaborating with partners and suppliers to have the latest insights.


**We are looking for you who have**
* Strong communication skills, able to articulate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
* Extensive experience with service management and agile development tools. Such as Atlassian suite (Jira, Confluence and BitBucket).
* Proven experience in designing and implementing complex solutions.
* At least 5 years of experience in IT Service Management, preferably ITIL. Experience working in agile environments, preferably within the SAFe framework.
* At least a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field.
* Good verbal and written skills in both Swedish and English.


**We offer you:**
**Benefits**
 We offer a variety of work in an international environment with constantly new challenges and quick decisions. Here you have opportunities to develop creative solutions and work in a prestige-free group where we jointly help to reach our goals. PostNord is one of Sweden's largest workplaces and we offer safe employment conditions and benefits. In addition to the benefits mentioned above, we offer:
   

  

* Hybrid workplace with a Nordic and dynamic environment. Watch the video about our office.
* Great development opportunities
* Great insurance and occupational pension terms
* Wellness allowance & opportunity to train at Arken's gym and indoor swimming pool
* Employee benefits through PostNord Plus - PostNord´s own personnel foundation


**We make everyday life easier**
 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are in a constant transformation and work consistently to develop both our offer and our employees, all to achieve our vision of being The favorite carrier of the Nordics. We are PostNord - a fantastic company to work and grow with. Read more at group.postnord.com
   

  

**Apply**
 We look forward to receive your application!
   

  

 If you have any questions or concerns, please e-mail johan.lovblad@postnord.com .
   

  

 Don't wait to submit your application as we go through the applications on an ongoing basis.
   

  

 For union representatives, visit: group.
 **postnord** 
 .com/sv/karriar2/fragor-och-svar/facklig-kontakt/
   

  

 We are looking forward to hear from you!

title: Site Security Manager - On-Site Security Operations
description:
*Saab serves the global market with world-leading products, services and solutions from military defence to civil security. With operations on every continent, Saab continuously develops, adapts and improves new technology to meet customers’ changing needs.*
*Saab sets a high standard when it comes to security and is now recruiting a Site Security manager*
 Your role
   

  

 Do you want to take the opportunity to work with a company with long history of keeping people and society safe?
   

  

 Site Security is one of the cornerstones for Security within Saab. Within Group Security the function supports the business by establishing the Site Security baseline.
   

  

 As Site Security Manager the main responsibility is to develop, establish, implement and manage on-site Security operations. An addition to this you will support the Site Security function in adjacent tasks.
   

  

 The world is changing rapidly and therefore we need to adapt and be proactive in our work to give the support to business as needed. Are you the one we are looking for?
   

  

 You will report to Head of Site Security in close collaboration with Head of Physical Security.
   

  

 The main tasks are:
   

  

* Enhance the on-site security operations within Saab Group.
* Develop, execute and manage an internal Site security On-Site operations training program.
* Develop and maintain Site, context and risk adapted, Standard Operating Procedures.
* Governance, management and development within the framework of security providers agreements.
* Provide general support within the Site Security area.
* Cooperate closely with the security function at large as well as other relevant functions such as Group Property and our business operations.
* Represent Group Security in a number of operative forums at Saab.
* We are a global company, we work in an international context, which will require national and international travelling.


 Your profile
   

  

 We are looking for persons that has a high level of drive and autonomy and at the same time have a prestigeless mindset. You have the ability to see the bigger picture and by that condense it to your area of expertise. We do things together and with full transparency within our team/function. In addition to the previous you have excellent interpersonal skills and has an easy way of making contacts and to cooperate inside and outside the company. You take pride in your interest for the area of Site Security and you keep yourself informed about changes in legislation or requirements within your area of responsibility.
   

  

 In your previous employments you have probably worked with Site Security operations, internal and external requirements/standards, developed standard operating procedures as well as planned and performed audits. You have extensive experience in developing, creating and executing training programs for a variety of receiving categories. You have the ability to receive a task/mission, identify the nice, the needs, affecting risks, present a plan and thereafter drive the task from ear to loaf.
   

  

 Required skills:
   

  

* More than 10 years of work experience
* More than 5 years of experience working with Site Security
* Excellent communication skills in English verbal and written
* Trustworthy with high standards of ethics and personal integrity.
* Well established experience of establishing Standard Operating Procedure.


 Desired skills:
   

  

* Working experience as Site Security manager is highly desired
* Certification within the area of Site Security, CPP etc.
* Facility management and Property
* Experience of working with Swedish as well as international site security standards and norms
* Experience of working with service providers in the security area
* High self-awareness especially regarding your personal strengths and weaknesses
* Analytical and structured
* Business and commercial understanding


 This position requires that you pass a security vetting based on the current regulations around/of security protection. For positions requiring security clearance additional obligations on citizenship may apply.
   

  

 What you will be a part of
   

  

 You will join a highly professional security function with personnel of different backgrounds and competences. We work mainly within the areas of physical security, information security and personnel security, including travel security. You will have an arena to develop both the Site Security work and also be a vital part of the whole function. You will work closely with the Security teams all over Saab as well as many other functions including Group Property. The personnel at Group Security are working from mainly from Stockholm or Linköping and you will probably get the best possible work environment to do so as well.
   

  

 Saab Group
   

  

 Kindly observe that this is an ongoing recruitment process and that the position might be filled before the closing date of the advertisement.
   

  

*If you aspire to help create and innovate whilst developing yourself in a challenging team setting, Saab may well have the perfect conditions for you to grow. We pride ourselves on a nurturing environment, where everyone is different yet we share the same goal – to help protect people.*

title: Application Engineer
description:
**Role:**

  

* We are looking for a hands on Data Engineer
* Work will mainly relate to cloud services we use Microsoft Azure as a cloud platform.
* As part of the team you will take part in the development cycle (requirement analysis, design, development, test, deployment, hand over).
* Design, build and integrate data from various sources.
* Write complex data queries and create data infrastructure in a simple and efficient matter.


Work closely with our business partners and help them to get better insight in our customers’ demand

**Essential requirements:**

  

* Ability to integrate data from a variety of sources using integration and orchestration tools as **Azure Data Factory** and **Databricks**
* Well familiar with Microsoft Azure Data lake, Azure SQL database and data warehouse solutions
* Familiarity with Azure Monitor or Log Analytics for real-time monitoring and troubleshooting of data pipelines, ensuring optimal performance and uptime.
* Experience in continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) practices using Azure DevOps, especially for automating data pipeline deployments.
* Experience in data exploration and data modeling e.g. Azure Analysis Services
* Develop and maintain Power BI reporting and self-service solution
* Self-motivated and self-going

Swedish and English is a must  
* 
* At least a Bachelor’s within Computer Science or comparable field and you have at least 2 years’ experience in software development

  

**Please explain how you meet all the requirements** **when applying.**  

  

**Utilization****:** 100**%**  

**Location:** Stockholm  

**Period**: 01-10-2024-30-06-2025  

**Last day to apply**: 29-09-2024

title: Senior Testledare
description:
Vi har nu ett behov hos en kund efter en Testledare och söker därför en kollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd som konsult och arbetar hos kund alt. interna åtaganden gentemot våra kunder.  

  

**Vår ambitioner**  

Vår målsättning är att vara det ledande IT-konsultföretaget med de mest nöjda medarbetarna och kunderna. Hos oss arbetar du inte för cheferna – ledarskapet är här för att stötta dig. Vi sätter dig i centrum och strävar efter att du ska utvecklas och växa. Vi erbjuder en inspirerande arbetsmiljö med god stämning, intressanta projekt hos intressanta kunder och en stark kultur av kunskapsdelning. Vi har tilltro till våra medarbetares innovationskraft och ger dig och dina kollegor möjlighet att både utvidga och fördjupa era kunskaper.  

  

**Jobbeskrivning**  

Utveckla, implementera och övervaka teststrategier och testplaner i projekt och Agil utveckling som spänner över flera affärsenheter och affärssystem.  

* Säkerställa kvalitet genom hela flödet, trots användning av olika testverktyg och teknologier mellan enheterna.
* Skapa och upprätthålla ett översiktligt samarbete mellan traditionella vattenfallsprojekt och Agila utvecklingsarbeten för att uppnå önskad kvalitet.
* Identifiera och hantera risker relaterade till testning och kvalitetssäkring.
* Utföra kontinuerlig förbättring av testprocesser och verktyg för att öka effektiviteten och kvaliteten.
* Rapportera testresultat och kvalitetsindikatorer till ledningen och andra intressenter.
* Integrera sig med utvecklare, produktägare, projektledning och andra intressenter för att säkerställa att testkrav och kvalitetsstandarder uppfylls.

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* Minst 7-10 års erfarenhet av testledning eller liknande roll inom mjukvaruutveckling, gärna inom Bank och Finans.
* Erfarenhet av end-to-end-testning i större organisationer och komplexa applikationslandskap.
* Djup förståelse för testmetoder, verktyg och processer, inklusive både manuella och automatiserade tester.
* Har erfarenhet av kravinsamling och analys, testdesign och hantering av testdata.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i både Agila utveckling (SAFe) och traditionella utvecklingsprojekt.
* Stark kommunikations- och samarbetsförmåga, med förmåga att arbeta effektivt med olika team och intressenter.
* Förmåga att vara flexibel och anpassningsbar i en snabbt föränderlig miljö.
* Beslutsamhet och förmåga att driva igenom strategiska initiativ och förändringar.
* Erfarenhet av att använda testverktyg som Azure DevOps Tesplans, Selenium, Playwright eller liknande.
* Certifieringar som ISTQB eller liknande är meriterande.

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 25-09-2024 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 **Om Deploja**  

Vi sysselsätter idag seniora IT-specialister, inom bl.a. utveckling, test, testledning, projektledning, databas, Drift, Linux och ser oss alltid om efter fler kompetenta medarbetare.  

  

Transparens och flexibilitet är i alla fall viktigt för oss, med oss får man som konsult majoriteten av sin egen intäkt, i snitt har våra medarbetare höjt sin ersättning med 43% och har samtidigt ett av marknadens bästa förmånspaket. De som är med på vår resa idag har en trygg anställning MEN sätter sin egen lön och bestämmer själva över sina förmåner så som pension, utbildning, arbetstid och tjänstebil.


Våra kunder finns bland annat inom detaljhandel, bank/finans/försäkring, energi, transport och offentlig sektor. De flesta av våra kunder är i Stockholmsregionen men vi har även kunder i andra delar av landet.  

  

Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket och semestertider dröjer återkoppling längre än vanligt.

title: Azure Expert
description:
**Role:**  

Azure Service Setup: Design, configure, and manage cloud services using Microsoft Azure, ensuring all deployments are aligned with our company’s policies and security standards.


Networking & Security: Setup and configure Azure networking, including subnets, firewalls, security groups, and VPNs to ensure secure and efficient communication between services.


Security: Expertise in Azure Security Center and Azure Key Vault, with a focus on managing access control, data encryption, and identity management.


File Services & App Functions: Configure and manage file services, app services, and function apps to meet project-specific needs.


Template-Based Infrastructure: Create and implement reusable templates for automated infrastructure provisioning, leveraging ARM templates, Azure Blueprints, or Terraform (strong plus).


Docker & Kubernetes (K8s): Knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes (K8s) for containerization and orchestration, ensuring efficient and scalable application deployments.


Python Development: Python coding skills for automating tasks, building custom Azure solutions, or working with APIs is a major plus.


Compliance & Best Practices: Ensure cloud deployments adhere to industry standards and compliance frameworks (e.g., GDPR, ISO 27001) and our internal governance policies.

**Essential requirements:**  

Proven experience in Microsoft Azure cloud architecture, deployment, and operations.


Expertise in Azure networking (subnets, virtual networks, VPN, firewalls, security groups).


Strong knowledge of Azure security best practices, security group configuration, and firewall management.


Hands-on experience with ARM templates, Terraform, or other infrastructure-as-code tools.


Experience in setting up file services, app functions, and general cloud services management.


Familiarity with Docker and Kubernetes (K8s) for container management and orchestration.


Proficiency in Python development for automation or solution integration is a plus.


Strong understanding of company policy alignment and adherence to security guidelines.


Excellent problem-solving skills, with a proactive attitude towards identifying and resolving potential issues.  

  

**Meritorious:**  

Certifications: Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert or similar.


Experience in working with template-based infrastructure for scalable and consistent cloud deployments.


Familiarity with DevOps practices, CI/CD pipelines, containerization (Docker both linux and windows), and orchestration (Kubernetes).  

  

**Please explain how you meet all the requirements** **when applying.**  

  

**Utilization****:** 20% 4-5 days/month  

**Location:** Malmö  

**Period**: 01-10-2024-30-09-2025  

**Last day to apply**: 29-09-2024  

We present regularly. This means that we sometimes remove the assignements from our website before the final application deadline. If you are interested in an assignement, we recommend that you submit your application as soon as possible.

title: Application Engineer
description:
Techster Solutions befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst 1+ års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.
  
Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.
  
  

**Rollbeskrivning:**  

Assignment Description
  
On behalf of our client we are looking for a hands on Application Engineer. You will work closely with our clients business partners and help them to get better insight in our customers demands.
  
Work will mainly relate to cloud services and use Microsoft Azure as a cloud platform.
  
As part of the team you will take part in the development cycle (requirement analysis, design, development, test, deployment, hand over).
  
Design, build and integrate data from various sources.
  
Write complex data queries and create data infrastructure in a simple and efficient matter.
  
  

Requirements
  
Ability to integrate data from a variety of sources using integration and orchestration tools as Azure Data Factory and Databricks
  
Good knowledge of Microsoft Azure Data lake, Azure SQL database and data warehouse solutions
  
Familiarity with Azure Monitor or Log Analytics for real-time monitoring and troubleshooting of data pipelines, ensuring optimal performance and uptime.
  
Experience in continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) practices using Azure DevOps, especially for automating data pipeline deployments.
  
Experience in data exploration and data modeling e.g. Azure Analysis Services
  
Develop and maintain Power BI reporting and self-service solution
  
Self-motivated and self-going
  
Swedish and English is a must
  
  

You need to be situated in Stockholm and work from our clients office in Stockholm 2 days per week.
  
  

Ansökan Tror du att du är Techster Solutions nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.
  
Arbetsplats och kulturVi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.
  
Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Senior Data Scientist (ML/DS Platform Team)
description:
Available in 5 locations
Category
Data, Analytics & Strategy
Job ID
R023965

Regular**Craft:**


Data, Analytics & Strategy**Job Description:**

**Senior Data Scientist - Machine Learning Platform / Data Science Platform Team**
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


We are open for this role to be based in one of our sweet locations in either:

* Stockholm
* Malmö
* Barcelona
* London
* Berlin

### **About the role**


King makes great games that offer fun, bite-size entertainment experiences for everyone to enjoy.


We are looking for an experienced data scientist to join our Data Science Platform team, which is part of the Machine Learning platform organization. The team consists of a mix of very experienced data scientists and ML Engineers / developers. The team's main focus is providing data scientists in the game teams at King with efficient and reliable tooling to boost their productivity, as well as catering to the explorative phases of building machine learning models. We have a tight collaboration with other teams in the ML organization which have responsibility for the later phases of the machine learning life-cycle.


One of the team’s main product is an internal Notebook platform built on top of the open source Jupyter projects, but extended and customized to integrate with other internal tooling, but also to help data scientists establish good workflows for other aspects of their job, such a CI/CD solutions when building internal packages, training on standard methodologies inside King etc.


We are looking for a great teammate who wants to help to empower our user base, which is counted in the hundreds of users, both by hands on building solutions but also identifying what recommended workflows should be.


We strive to not reinvent the wheel but rather to use existing open source and commercial products when possible, but often also need to write code to properly integrate both internal and external solutions in an effective manner for our users.

### **Skills to create thrills**

* Good understanding and hands-on experience with Python
* Good understanding of the day to day life of a Data Scientist / ML Engineer
* DevOps experience, such as CI/CD solutions and infrastructure as code
* Knowledge in how to write services and create reusable libraries
* Self-starter with a great drive and a curious and inquisitive mind-set
* Willing to step outside your comfort zone to broaden your skills and learn new technologies
* Highly collaborative work style and open to share your knowledge, receiving and giving feedback, performing code reviews and so on
* You will need to be able to work independently on complex problems and be able to clearly communicate your ideas and solutions.

### **Bonus points**

* Knowledge in R
* Experience writing plugins/extensions for JupyterLab
* SQL and query optimization skills and good understanding of data modeling techniques
* Containerizing workloads and running these on Kubernetes (GKE)
* Experience with TensorFlow, PyTorch or any other ML framework
* Experience with ZenML and/or MLFlow
* Google Cloud Platform including BigQuery or experience with other cloud computing provider

**About King**


At King, we're Making the World Playful. Heard of Candy Crush? We're the creators behind it. With game studios in Stockholm, Malmö, London, Barcelona and Berlin, and offices in Dublin, San Francisco, New York, and Malta, we have a 20-year history of delivering some of the world's most iconic games in the mobile gaming industry and are on a mission to level-up the little moments for our more than 200 million active monthly users. But we aren't just crushing it with candies, we're also behind Farm Heroes, Bubble Witch, Pet Rescue and loads of other sweet games. As a leading interactive entertainment company for the mobile world, King is part of Activision Blizzard, which was acquired by Microsoft.

**A Great Saga Needs All Sorts of Heroes**


King strives to be a place where everyone can be their most authentic self. We recognize that diversity, equity and inclusion is a vital and continuous conversation, and that change only happens when we all come together. It’s our mission to build a diverse and inclusive Kingdom for our people, players, and community.

**Making the World Playful**


Making the World Playful is our mission – it’s the thread that connects our people, our players, and our passion for our games. Let’s face it, who doesn’t love a bit of fun?


Kingsters are seriously playful: creative thinkers who balance art and science to bring moments of magic to millions daily. But our players aren’t the only ones that can level-up. We’re always looking for ways to champion each other and make what’s already great, even better.


So, if this feels like a fun way to spend your days, and you share our passion, our values, and our hunger to shape the future, join us in Making the World Playful.


Applications need to be in English.  

Discover King at careers.king.com

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
DevOps Engineer | Fintech | AWS | Microservices | Kubernetes | Stockholm | Cloud Computing
 



  





**About the Company:** 
 This company is revolutionizing the way people compare and apply for loans. As one of Sweden's fastest-growing FinTech companies, they are dedicated to delivering seamless financial services to over 500,000 customers. Their state-of-the-art cloud platform, powered by microservices and event-driven architecture, is central to their mission of providing the best possible loan deals. As they continue to scale, they are seeking talented individuals to join their innovative tech team.
 



  





**The Role:** 
 The company is seeking an experienced AWS DevOps Engineer to help scale and enhance their cloud infrastructure. In this role, the engineer will play a crucial part in managing and optimizing microservices environments, ensuring robust and efficient operations. Additionally, the engineer will lead efforts to advance networking capabilities and spearhead key architectural initiatives.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Design, deploy, and maintain AWS infrastructure to support the company’s scalable, microservices-based platform.
* Manage and optimize microservices environments, ensuring seamless integration and performance.
* Lead networking initiatives to enhance the reliability and security of the cloud infrastructure.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive continuous improvements in DevOps processes.
* Implement automation and monitoring solutions to ensure high availability and quick recovery.



  





**What the Company Is Looking For:** 



* Extensive experience with AWS services and cloud infrastructure.
* Strong expertise in managing and deploying microservices architecture.
* Solid understanding of basic networking concepts and their application in a cloud environment.
* Experience with CI/CD pipelines, automation tools, and infrastructure as code (e.g., Terraform, or other IaC tools).
* A proactive, problem-solving mindset with a passion for innovation and continuous improvement.



  





**Why Apply:** 



* Be part of a company that’s transforming the financial landscape in Sweden.
* Work with a forward-thinking, collaborative team in a fast-paced, innovative environment.
* Enjoy flexibility with hybrid/remote work options—on average, team members work three days from home.
* Competitive salary, benefits, and opportunities for professional growth.



  





**Contact Information:** 
 For any questions, please contact Luqman Mohammed-Brown at L.mohammed-brown@tenthrevolution.com.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Metrea Simulations is looking for a DevOps/Build Engineer to join our team and play a key role in shaping our infrastructure. This role will have a big part in designing, developing , and maintaining our environment across a hybrid infrastructure of cloud and on-premise environments as well as our build system. You will work closely with developers, ensuring smooth and efficient delivery of high-quality software.
   

  

 This role will require you to be a team player who enjoys working in a multidisciplinary environment and expects you to be communicative and independent in your work. You should be motivated to find creative and scalable solutions for complex problems.
   

  

**R Esponsibilities Include**
* Design, maintain and configure infrastructure across both public cloud and on-premise environments, including Windows and Linux servers.
* Collaborate with developers and operations teams to ensure seamless integration and delivery.
* Monitor system health and performance, proactively identify and troubleshoot potential issues.
* Support developers in designing, developing, and implementing automated build and deployment pipelines.
* Develop and maintain build system and agents ecosystem


**Requirements**
* Experience with configuration management tools like Ansible, Chef, or Puppet.
* Experience with CI/CD tools like TeamCity, Jenkins, or Azure DevOps.
* Experience working with public cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP.
* Solid understanding of Windows and Linux server administration.
* Scripting experience with languages like Python, PowerShell or Bash.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
* Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.


 Things we think could be useful in this role
   

  

* Passion for anything aerospace-related
* Interest in flight simulation
* Experience working with international teams
* Background in related fields (e.g., Military, Aerospace, Software, Engineering)

title: Senior Solution Architect
description:
Innovative Heads is a IT Service provider in Europe & India. It follows start-up culture and has flat organization where everyone has high visibility for work and performance. We are working with domain leaders in the industry, helping clients to achieve their goals.
 



  





 We are urgently looking for l
 
 ooking for a
 
**senior solution architect** 

 for our Stockholm based client.
 




  





 Start date: ASAP
 



 Contract duration: 2 years
 



 Language: Swedish mandatory
 



 Onsite
 



  





**Skillset:** 



* Specialized competence within cloud development, proficient in test-driven development as well as DevOps.
* As a Solution Architect for test tools, responsible for designing and overseeing the architecture of the product.
* Will work closely with product owners, developers, and other stakeholders to ensure that the test tool is scalable, reliable, and meets the highest standards of quality.
* As there is a Cloud-first strategy, extensive knowledge of AWS is needed and the ability to work as a senior developer in the teams.



  





**Scenario:** 




**Current solution** 
 : On prem solution for test management system built by company used by primarily company users
 



**New solution:** 
 Migrate IT-solutions to a cloud based solution accessible from any country where TRATON is present. Secure a strategic roadmap that fits TRATON´s and company´s visions.
 



  





  





**Tasks and output:** 




 Excerpt of example tasks that the candidate will perform: lead change within the technology, organization and business, set up good practices and policies, provide advice regarding architecture to the teams on various levels, design our solutions for the future, be a sounding board for the different teams architects as well as the individual developers
 



  





  





**Remote work:** 




 Wednesdays are Thursdays mandatory to be on site.
 



 Requirement to be able to be on site 3 days a week minimum.
 



 At crucial situations there must be a possibility to work 5 days on site.
 



 During our Program Increment Planning weeks (All weeks ending with a 6 meaning 6, 16, 26, 36 and 46) 100% availability is needed.
 



  





  





**Education** 
 :
 



 Master of Science, (other level of education is also acceptable if proven track record of work can match the education level), Scaled Agile Framework, SCRUM
 



  





  





**Language** 
 :
 



 Swedish & English on a professional level
 



  





  





**Meriting:** 




 API development, Information management, Experience and proficiency in AWS, Test Driven development and Dev Ops
 



 Experience from software tool development preferably related to test management tools. 
 



 Experience from operating as solution architect in a true global context
 



  





 Please feel free to reach out to hr@innovativeheads.com for further queries

title: Solution Architect
description:
*Vi på Iver ger samma löfte till våra kollegor som till våra kunder. Löftet är att alltid vara ”beside you”, ”behind you” och ”before you”. Vi kallar det för ”The Iver way”.*
*Nu söker vi en lösningsarkitekt med intresse för Presale som vill bli en del av Iver och som vill vara med och bidra till bättre IT-lösningar som gör skillnad för våra kunder!* 
*Är du vår nya kollega?*
**Din roll på Iver?**
 Iver är en ledande nordisk helhetsleverantör av molnbaserade IT-tjänster med spetskompetens inom drift, cybersäkerhet, cloud och innovation. Iver har cirka 1 500 medarbetare och omsätter drygt 3 miljarder SEK.
   

  

 I rollen som Solution Architect blir du en del av vårt team inom affärsvertikalen Bank & Fintech. Tillsammans arbetar vi för att säkerställa att våra kunder får bästa möjliga lösningar, med djup förståelse för kundens verksamhet driver vi digital transformation med ett gemensamt intresse för hur vi kan utveckla kundens affär.
   

  

**Vad ingår i tjänsten som arkitekt hos oss?**
* Designa och implementera tekniska lösningar som uppfyller våra kunders behov.
* Vara med och utforma nya tjänster och leveranser.
* Ansvar för arkitekturen av våra kundleveranser och vidareutveckling inom området.
* Du kommer få fria händer för att hitta nya spännande lösningar/effektiviseringar på utmaningar inom leveranserna.


 En viktig del av din roll kommer vara att utbilda och vägleda andra tekniker i våra team. Detta kan innebära att du hjälper dem att förstå komplexa tekniska koncept, ger feedback på deras arbete och hjälper dem att utveckla sina tekniska färdigheter.
   

  

 Du kommer att behöva kommunicera effektivt med både tekniska och icke-tekniska intressenter. Detta kan innebära att förklara tekniska koncept på ett sätt som icke-tekniska kunder kan förstå, samt att kommunicera teamets framsteg och utmaningar.
   

  

**Vad erbjuder vi dig?**
**Iver - Where technology meets business.** 
 Hos Iver får du möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste tekniken och vara med på en spännande tillväxtresa. Iver är ett bolag med entreprenöriella rötter och en kultur som präglas av flexibilitet och samarbete. Vårt mål är att våra kunder – här i Norden och internationellt – ska se oss som en ledande partner för digital transformation.
   

  

 På Iver är vi inkluderande och strävar efter genuint samarbete där vi arbetar mot gemensamma mål. Inom Iver finns stora möjligheter till utveckling och vi står bakom dig när du vill lära dig mer – inom ditt specialområde, ledarskap eller nya områden.
   

  

 Hos Iver är du också en del av ett ambitiöst och innovativt företag, vilket innebär att förbättra, testa, utvärdera och våga ändra hur vi gör saker är viktiga ingredienser och vi är övertygade om att det är så vi utvecklas.
 **We’re not big blue. We’re yellow.** 
 Stora nog att skala och agila nog att innovera.
   

  

**Vem söker vi?**
 Vi söker dig som har en bakgrund inom systemutveckling eller drift men som har jobbat med arkitektur de senaste åren. Arkitektrollen kräver att du är lösningsfokuserad med god kommunikationsförmåga. Rollen innefattar även mycket fria händer där vi ser att du är driven att skapa förbättringar och trivs med att grotta i komplexa tekniska lösningar för våra kunder. Du kommer att behöva förstå våra kunders affärsbehov och översätta dem till effektiva tekniska lösningar som är förvaltningsbara och säkra.
   

  

 Tjänsten kräver goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift. Erfarenhet ifrån Bank & Fintech är meriterande men inget krav.
   

  

**F** 
**ör att lyckas i rollen vill vi att du har kunskaper inom flera av områdena:**
* Kubernetes/OpenShift, IaC (t ex Terraform).
* Mycket goda kunskaper inom Windows & Linux.
* Hårdvara och mjukvara för cybersäkerhet som NGFW, EDR, SIEM m.fl.
* Flertalet operativsystem och databaser samt nätverkskunskap.
* DevOps (CI/CD, automation)
* Något utvecklingsspråk (Python, Go, C#, PowerShell)


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av något modelleringsverktyg Visio, Draw IO.
* Erfarenhet av arkitektur inom moln-teknologier.
* God erfarenhet av PCI-DSS.


 Ivers affärsområde Bank & Fintech ansvarar för tjänsteleverans och drift för kunder med särskilda säkerhetskrav. Av denna anledning kommer vi i rekryteringsprocessen genomföra bakgrundskontroller.
   

  

**Placeringsort**
 Iver finns på 25 platser i Sverige & Norge. För denna roll ser vi att du utgår från ett av våra kontor i Solna, men rätt kandidat kan bo med omnejd till Stockholm.
   

  

**Sök till oss!**
 Urval sker löpande, tjänsten kan tillsättas före sista ansökningsdag. Iver eftersträvar en jämn könsfördelning och värdesätter etnisk och kulturell mångfald. Önskad start är snarast eller enligt överenskommelse. Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-09-30. Du är välkommen att kontakta Poonam Jain (poonam.jain@iver.se) vid frågor eller funderingar kring tjänsten. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Välkommen till Iver!
   

  

**We empower our Nordic society** 
 . Iver är en ledande nordisk helhetsleverantör av molnbaserade IT-tjänster med spetskompetens inom drift, cybersäkerhet, cloud och innovation.
   

  

**Våra tjänster är kritiska inte bara för våra kunder – utan för digitaliseringen av samhället i stort.** 
 Vi säkerställer att sjukvården har tillgång till rätt patientdata, att samhällskritiska system aldrig ligger nere och att flygplanen landar säkert. Som en lyhörd och affärsnära helhetspartner möjliggör vi våra kunders innovation – idag och imorgon.
